text: Suhana Thapa () is Nepalese film actress, and producer. She is the daughter film producer Sunil Kumar Thapa and film actress turned director Jharana Thapa. She debuted as an actress from her home-production film A Mero Hajur 3 (2019) opposite of Anmol K.C. She won Best debut actress award for A Mero Hajur 3 at Kamana Film awards and at D Cine Awards == Career == === Film production === She has also produced A Mero Hajur (2002), and A Mero Hajur 2 (2017). ===Acting career=== Thapa appeared as child artist in A Mero Hajur (2002), she recalls "Yes, A Mero Hajur was my first movie, but I hardly remember it since I was very young.". In the prequel of A Mero Hajur (2002) she appeared as a lead actress in A Mero Hajur 3 (2019) opposite of Anmol K.C., film became an blockbuster. {| class="wikitable" |+Key | style="background:#ffc;"| | Denotes films that have not yet been released |- | style="background:#add8e6;"| | Indicates documentary release |} {|class="wikitable" !Year!!Film!!Role !Director!!Note |- |2019 |A Mero Hajur 3 |Arya | Jharana Thapa | debut film |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:People from Kathmandu Category:Nepalese actresses Category:Nepalese film producers Category:1996 births
title: Suhana Thapa
